akn:section.akn:heading: Cooperation of other departments and agencies

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 10249. Cooperation of other departments and agencies Each department, agency, and instrumentality of the United States, including any independent agency, may furnish the Negotiator such information as he determines to be necessary to carry out his functions under this subchapter. (Pub. L. 97–425, title IV, § 409, as added Pub. L. 100–202, § 101(d) [title III], Dec. 22, 1987, 101 Stat. 1329–104, 1329–121; Pub. L. 100–203, title V, § 5041, Dec. 22, 1987, 101 Stat. 1330–247.)
Editorial Notes Codification Pub. L. 100–202 and Pub. L. 100–203 added identical sections.
